task.title: Review and Submit Mass Update for Job and Salary Information
task.shortdesc: Review the information entered for the mass update on the Summary page. Return to the applicable page to make any changes.

step.cmd: From the Summary page, review the information related to the job and salary changes.
Select the Selected Employee(s) link to view the list of employees included in the update.
Review the fields that were changed during the mass update. The salary calculations take place after the mass update is submitted.
Select Submit. The Mass Updates page appears.
